top_comments.comment: I’d like to enter the giveaway.I’ve worn clones of ADG when I was very young as I did not have money for the real thing, and by the time I grew up I started using other scents so I never owned one. It would be nice to have it in the collection ✌️

comments_since_last_sample.body: Recently got into fragrances but I’ve got to smell ADG and a few of its flankers and they’ve been amazing. Having a bottle of the original for myself would be great.
Hi Ash, I’ve never owned ADG, but I would love to add this classic to my collection! I appreciate the giveaway opportunity!
I am only starting to collect fragrances... I have never worn acqua di gio before, infact its not easily accessible at retail here in south africa. Hopefully i get to own one someday
My dads favourite fragrance!I used to steal some of his when i was younger and didnt own any fragrance of my own.

I would like to enter the giveaway. Personally i have never owned ADG but i would love that to change.I've heard great things about it. My fragrance collection is pretty small and the addition of ADG in it would be amazing!
Love the Acqua do Gio DNA Profondo is my signature scent. Wouldn’t hurt to have the OG back in my rotation !
I purchased ADG Profundo 3 months ago and love it. I'd like to try the the original and compare the two.
Acqua Di Gio is a parfume that match with my country Indonesia that have tropic weather
Man....last time I rocked it was 99...I would love it again...if I don't win..I might just buy me one
I can say I’ve never owned or smelled Aqua Di Gio , well maybe unknowingly smelled it. That being said I’ve herd that it is amazing just haven’t picked up a bottle yet to try.
I’d like to be entered.  Wore this back in the late 90’s.  These days only have Profumo and Profondo so adding again would be great.  Thanks
Great giveaway. Wore ADG many, many years ago. Nearly everyone loves this scent 👍
